name: Tempur Sealy International, Inc.
description: Tempur Sealy International, Inc. is a leading global manufacturer and distributor of mattresses, bedding products, and other sleep-related items. Founded in 2012 through the merger of Tempur-Pedic and Sealy, the company has a rich heritage dating back to the invention of TEMPUR material, a high-performance viscoelastic foam originally developed by NASA. Tempur Sealy's primary mission is to improve the quality of sleep for consumers worldwide through innovative products that provide comfort, support, and durability. The company offers a diverse range of brands, including Tempur-Pedic, Sealy, and Stearns & Foster, which cater to various consumer preferences and price points. With an extensive distribution network, Tempur Sealy products are available in retail stores, online platforms, and through partnerships with hotels and other hospitality providers. The company is committed to sustainability and community engagement, focusing on responsible sourcing of materials and reducing its environmental impact. Tempur Sealy continues to invest in research and development to enhance its product offerings and remains at the forefront of the sleep industry.

faq.question: What types of products does Tempur Sealy offer?
faq.answer: Tempur Sealy offers a wide range of mattresses and bedding accessories, including pillows and mattress protectors.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Tempur Sealy?
faq.answer: Scott Thompson is the CEO of Tempur Sealy International, Inc.

faq.question: Where is Tempur Sealy headquartered?
faq.answer: Tempur Sealy is headquartered in Lexington, Kentucky, USA.
